body:
I would prefer to write more text to go inside collapsable sections, rather
than hiding any existing text.

There's a lot more explanation we should give, and we should give it to
people who are interested.

On 9 October 2015 at 11:28, Dave Cheney <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I'd prefer not to do this. Experience has shown that many tour users font
> read the text when it is right in front of them, hiding it would be counter
> productive.
>
> On Fri, 9 Oct 2015 11:22 Minux Ma <notifications@github.com> wrote:
>
> > Some recent CLs to the tour added hints to certain problems
> > where the user used to have to think for themselves.
> >
> > I suggest that we add collapsible hint sections to hide these
> > spoiler contents by default.
> >
> > —
> > Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> > <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/12885>.
>
